ayah_text: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَنْزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ الْكِتَابَ وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ لَهُ عِوَجًا
english_translation: All praise is due to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.
transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-lathee anzala 'ala 'abdi-hil-kitaba wa lam yaj'al lahu 'iwaja
theme: Praise for the revelation of the Quran
tajweed_notes: Lam shamsiyyah in الْحَمْدُ; tanween on عِوَجًا

ayah_text: قَيِّمًا لِيُنْذِرَ بَأْسًا شَدِيدًا مِنْ لَدُنْهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ الَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا
english_translation: Making it straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward.
transliteration: Qayyimal-liyunthira ba'san shadeedam-mil-ladunhu wa yubashshiral-mu'mineenal-latheena ya'maloonas-salihati anna lahum ajran hasana
theme: The Quran as warning and glad tidings
tajweed_notes: Ikhfa in مِنْ لَدُنْهُ; qalqalah in بَأْسًا

ayah_text: مَاكِثِينَ فِيهِ أَبَدًا
english_translation: In which they will remain forever.
transliteration: Makitheena feehi abada
theme: Eternal reward for the believers
tajweed_notes: Madd tabee'i in فِيهِ (2 counts)

ayah_text: وَيُنْذِرَ الَّذِينَ قَالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللَّهُ وَلَدًا
english_translation: And to warn those who say, 'Allah has taken a son.'
transliteration: Wa yunthiral-latheena qaalut-takhathal-lahu walada
theme: Warning against attributing a son to Allah
tajweed_notes: Ikhfa in يُنْذِرَ; lam shamsiyyah in الَّذِينَ

ayah_text: مَا لَهُمْ بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ وَلَا لِآبَائِهِمْ كَبُرَتْ كَلِمَةً تَخْرُجُ مِنْ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ إِنْ يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبًا
english_translation: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie.
transliteration: Ma lahum bihi min 'ilmiw-wala li-aabaa'ihim. Kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihim. Iy-yaqooloona illa kathiba
theme: Condemnation of false claims about Allah
tajweed_notes: Qalqalah in كَبُرَتْ; ikhfa in مِنْ عِلْمٍ and مِنْ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ

ayah_text: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَاخِعٌ نَفْسَكَ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ إِنْ لَمْ يُؤْمِنُوا بِهَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
english_translation: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, if they do not believe in this message, out of sorrow.
transliteration: Fala'allaka bakhi'un nafsaka 'ala aatharihim il-lam yu'minoo bi-hathal-hadeethi asafa
theme: Consolation for the Prophet over the disbelievers
tajweed_notes: Ghunnah in بَاخِعٌ نَفْسَكَ; madd tabee'i in الْحَدِيثِ

ayah_text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا مَا عَلَى الْأَرْضِ زِينَةً لَهَا لِنَبْلُوَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
english_translation: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them as to which of them is best in deed.
transliteration: Inna ja'alna ma 'alal-ardi zeenatal-laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 'amala
theme: The world as a test of deeds
tajweed_notes: Ghunnah in إِنَّا; qalqalah in جَعَلْنَا

ayah_text: وَإِنَّا لَجَاعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيْهَا صَعِيدًا جُرُزًا
english_translation: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it into a barren ground.
transliteration: Wa inna laja'iloona ma 'alayha sa'eedan juruza
theme: The transient nature of worldly life
tajweed_notes: Ghunnah in إِنَّا; madd tabee'i in لَجَاعِلُونَ

ayah_text: أَمْ حَسِبْتَ أَنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْكَهْفِ وَالرَّقِيمِ كَانُوا مِنْ آيَاتِنَا عَجَبًا
english_translation: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder?
transliteration: Am hasibta anna as-habal-kahfi war-raqeemi kanoo min aayatina 'ajaba
theme: Introduction to the story of the People of the Cave
tajweed_notes: Qalqalah in حَسِبْتَ; ikhfa in مِنْ آيَاتِنَا

ayah_text: إِذْ أَوَى الْفِتْيَةُ إِلَى الْكَهْفِ فَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
english_translation: When the youths retreated to the cave and said, 'Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.'
transliteration: Ith awal-fityatu ilal-kahfi faqaloo Rabbana aatina mil-ladunka rahmataw-wa hayyi' lana min amrina rashada
theme: The youths seek refuge and pray for guidance
tajweed_notes: Ikhfa in مِنْ لَدُنْكَ and مِنْ أَمْرِنَا; idgham in رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ

ayah_text: يس
english_translation: Ya, Seen.
transliteration: Yaa-Seeen
theme: Disjointed letters opening the surah
tajweed_notes: Madd laazim harfi on each letter: Ya (no madd), Seen (6 counts)

ayah_text: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
english_translation: By the wise Quran.
transliteration: Wal-Qur'aanil-Hakeem
theme: Oath by the wise Quran
tajweed_notes: Madd tabee'i in الْحَكِيمِ (2 counts); qalqalah in الْقُرْآنِ

ayah_text: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
english_translation: Indeed you are from among the messengers.
transliteration: Innaka laminal-mursaleen
theme: Confirmation of Muhammad's prophethood
tajweed_notes: Ghunnah in إِنَّكَ; madd tabee'i in الْمُرْسَلِينَ

ayah_text: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
english_translation: On a straight path.
transliteration: 'Ala siratim-mustaqeem
theme: The straight path of the Prophet
tajweed_notes: Tafkheem on ص in صِرَاطٍ; madd tabee'i in مُسْتَقِيمٍ

ayah_text: تَنْزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
english_translation: A revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Especially Merciful.
transliteration: Tanzeelal-'Azeezir-Raheem
theme: The Quran is from Allah the Mighty and Merciful
tajweed_notes: Madd tabee'i in الرَّحِيمِ and الْعَزِيزِ (2 counts each)

ayah_text: لِتُنْذِرَ قَوْمًا مَا أُنْذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
english_translation: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.
transliteration: Litunthira qawmam-ma unthira aabaa'uhum fahum ghafiloon
theme: Warning a heedless people
tajweed_notes: Ikhfa in لِتُنْذِرَ; idgham in قَوْمًا مَا

ayah_text: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
english_translation: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
transliteration: Laqad haqqal-qawlu 'ala aktharihim fahum la yu'minoon
theme: The decree upon the disbelievers
tajweed_notes: Qalqalah in لَقَدْ; ghunnah on noon in يُؤْمِنُونَ

ayah_text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُمْ مُقْمَحُونَ
english_translation: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads raised up.
transliteration: Inna ja'alna fee a'naqihim aghlalan fahiya ilal-athqani fahum muqmahoon
theme: Metaphor for the stubbornness of disbelievers
tajweed_notes: Ghunnah in إِنَّا; qalqalah in أَغْلَالًا

ayah_text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
english_translation: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.
transliteration: Wa ja'alna mim-bayni aydeehim saddaw-wa min khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynahum fahum la yubsiroon
theme: Barriers placed upon disbelievers preventing them from seeing truth
tajweed_notes: Iqlab in مِنْ بَيْنِ; idgham in سَدًّا وَمِنْ

ayah_text: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنْذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنْذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
english_translation: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
transliteration: Wa sawaa'un 'alayhim a-anthartahum am lam tunthirhum la yu'minoon
theme: The sealed fate of those who refuse to believe
tajweed_notes: Hamzatain (two hamzas) in أَأَنْذَرْتَهُمْ; ikhfa in أَنْذَرْتَهُمْ

ayah_text: إِنَّمَا تُنْذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
english_translation: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.
transliteration: Innama tunthiru manit-taba'ath-thikra wa khashiyar-Rahmana bil-ghaybi fabashirhu bi-maghfiratiw-wa ajrin kareem
theme: Only those who follow the reminder benefit from warning
tajweed_notes: Ghunnah in إِنَّمَا; ikhfa in تُنْذِرُ; madd tabee'i in كَرِيمٍ

ayah_text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُبِينٍ
english_translation: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.
transliteration: Inna nahnu nuhyil-mawta wa naktubu ma qaddamoo wa aatharahum wa kulla shay'in ahsaynahu fee imamim-mubeen
theme: Allah records all deeds and resurrects the dead
tajweed_notes: Ghunnah in إِنَّا; ikhfa in إِمَامٍ مُبِينٍ
